overview:
Simon Schnieders is a search marketing expert focused on the discipline of SEO primarily.

His background includes affiliate marketing, SEM, social media and monetizing sites.

Schnieders is Head of SEO for Zoopla.co.uk, (The fastest growing property website in the UK). Previously he was Head of SEO for European Directories, a pan-European IYP and lead generation company & is recognized prior to this for driving the growth surge in search engine traffic for the UK’s number one newspaper website, Mail Online, (dailymail.co.uk) in 2009.

Schnieders dedicates his spare time to bootstrapped startup Explore To, (http://explore.to). The site contains 17m+ local business listings and is the first local search engine to use Facebook, “Likes” as a ranking factor.

Other sites he’s worked on for SEO include, thisismoney.co.uk, metro.co.uk, www.localpeople.co.uk and yell.com.
